DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Stops the ship, either normally, as an emergency stop, or in a slow drift.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>stopType</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>How to Stop: </myLabel> <myToolTip>Normal uses normal acceleration factor, emergency uses full deceleration, and drift is a slow deceleration.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Normal</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Normal;Emergency;Drift</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
